Package com.simcoder.snapchatclone.Login

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationActivity
    Every Fragment in the auth ecosystem is controlled through this activity
    DetailsFragment
    Fragment responsible for registering a new user
    LauncherActivity
    First activity being called.
    LoginFragment
    Fragment responsible for Logging in a new user
    MenuFragment
    Fragment that contains the menu for the user to choose either the DetailsFragment or the LoginFragment
